channel.title: About on Auke Rijpma
channel.description: Recent content in About on Auke Rijpma

item.title: Data
item.description: Data Openarch deaths Cleaned, deduplicated and (partially) standardized version of Dutch death certificates (c. 1811-1960), retrieved from openarch.nl. The csv files per archive, used to create this dataset, were retrieved in January 2020. Scripts used to create this dataset are available at github/wp4-civreg (version 1.0). Repository Church construction data A dataset on church construction in Western Europe, 700â€“1500, based on OpenStreetMap. ğŸ—º â›ª Licence (following the OSM source licence).
